con:restRequest.name: ProcessMarketingEventErnPtnTrxn
con:restRequest.con:request: { "MarketingEventChannels": [ { "MarketingEventChannelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#MarketingEventChannelId}", "ChannelName": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#ChannelName}", } ], "EventName": "OFFER_NAME${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("mmddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "EventCode": "OFFER_CODE${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("mmddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "PackagedAudience": { "PackagedAudienceId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedAudienceId}", "AudienceName": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#AudienceName}", }, "AudienceSource": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#AudienceSource}", "PackagedOffer": { "PackagedOfferId": "327a3e11-59eb-4867-9711-dbf011421ae6", "PackagedOfferCode": "EARN_POINTS_ON_TXN", "PackagedOfferName": "Earn Points on a Transaction", "PackagedOfferParams": [ { "PackagedOfferParamId": "fa7588bf-06ee-4541-b9c5-4d03adcf7c61", "PackagedOfferId": "327a3e11-59eb-4867-9711-dbf011421ae6", "ParamName": "Minimum transaction amount", "ParamCode": "MIN_TXN_AMT", "Value": "100", "PanelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelIdCustAct}", "PanelCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelCodeCustAct}", }, { "PackagedOfferParamId":"a1579fd2-2a7c-44e6-88bc-ed7d6319de83", "PackagedOfferId": "327a3e11-59eb-4867-9711-dbf011421ae6", "ParamName": "Point amount", "ParamCode": "POINT_AMT_REWARDED", "Value": "5", "PanelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelIdCustRew}", "PanelCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelCodeCustRew}", } ], "PackagedOfferCategoryId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedOfferCategoryId}", "PackagedOfferCategoryCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedOfferCategoryCode}", }, "OfferStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+2)}", "OfferEndDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+4)}", "Status": "A", }

"PurchaseTxn", "MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDateTime", "MomentOffers": [ { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}", "MomentOutcome": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "OutcomeEquationUi": "{{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}", "FormulaName": "FIXEDAMT", "Status": "A" }, "MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE}}", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null)) AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY profile_id )

}", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
 SELECT profile_id,
 {{OFFERS_QUERY}}
 FROM t_act_transaction
 WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null))
 AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
 {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
 GROUP BY profile_id
)", "OfferMomentEligibleCriteriaPart": "(PurchaseTxn.Offers.OfferCode == \"{{OFFERCODEOFFERNAME}}\")", "PackagedOfferParams": [ { "MarketingEventId": "e559f306-e429-4f8d-bc8e-0ab3204d1d7a", "PackagedOfferParamId": "fa7588bf-06ee-4541-b9c5-4d03adcf7c61", "PackagedOfferId": "327a3e11-59eb-4867-9711-dbf011421ae6", "ParamName": "Minimum transaction amount", "ParamCode": "MIN_TXN_AMT", "ParamDescription": "0", "DataType": "input", "ParamControl": "decimal", "IsRequired": true, "Value": "100", "PanelId": "e0e698ac-4191-d25d-e053-5dedef0ac6ef", "PanelCode": "CUSTOMER_ACTIVITY" }, { "MarketingEventId": "e559f306-e429-4f8d-bc8e-0ab3204d1d7a", "PackagedOfferParamId": "a1579fd2-2a7c-44e6-88bc-ed7d6319de83", "PackagedOfferId": "327a3e11-59eb-4867-9711-dbf011421ae6", "ParamName": "Point amount", "ParamCode": "POINT_AMT_REWARDED", "ParamDescription": "0", "DataType": "input", "ParamControl": "number", "IsRequired": true, "Value": "5", "PanelId": "e0e698ac-4291-d25d-e053-5dedef0ac6ef", "PanelCode": "CUSTOMER_REWARD" } ], "PackagedOfferCategoryId": "17872aea-5187-8d43-a4be-555c17300611", "PackagedOfferCategoryCode": "TEMPLATES" }, "OfferStartDate": "2022-02-05T09:01:42Z", "OfferEndDate": "2022-02-07T09:01:42Z", "OnlineMessageCode": "OFFER_CODE31032022023142031", "OptInStatus": false, "AddOnlineMessageToEmail": false, "IsAudienceCountCompleted": true, "IsOfferSimulationCompleted": false, "MarketingEventAudienceCount": { "AudienceCountId": "8dc84020-7d3f-4a34-a2a0-581683172bba", "MarketingEventId": "e559f306-e429-4f8d-bc8e-0ab3204d1d7a", "AudienceCountCalculationStartTime": "2022-02-03T09:01:56.297113Z", "AudienceCountCalculationEndTime": "2022-02-03T09:01:56.297113Z", "AudienceCount": 15192, "AudienceCountStatus": "C" }, "BusinessUnitTimeZone": "UTC", "Status": "A", "CreateUser": "AUTO_USER", "CreateDate": "2022-02-03T09:01:48.844584Z", "UpdateUser": "BATCH_USER", "UpdateDate": "2022-02-03T09:02:03.628385Z" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null)) AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY profile_id )

 "OutcomeEquationTemplate": "%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22fixedpoints%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_0%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22{{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22drools%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22String.valueOf({{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}})%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D",
 "FormulaName": "FIXEDAMT",
 "Status": "A"
 },
 "MomentQualifyingRule": {
 "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
 "EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
 "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
 "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE}}",
 "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}]
 },
 "Status": "A"
 }
 ]
},
"Status": "A",
"BestOfferIndicator": false,
"AdvancedModeIndicator": false,
"IsTestUser": false,
"ReleaseState": "P"
}", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
 SELECT profile_id,
 {{OFFERS_QUERY}}
 FROM t_act_transaction
 WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null))
 AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
 {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
 GROUP BY profile_id
